title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.310 - Lima beans with ham in sauce, beans with ham in sauce, beans with bacon in sauce, and similar products
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.310 - Lima beans with ham in sauce, beans with ham in sauce, beans with bacon in sauce, and similar products

State Regulations
"Lima Beans with Ham in Sauce", "Beans with Ham in

Sauce", "Beans with Bacon in Sauce", and similar products shall contain not
less than 12 percent ham or bacon computed on the weight of the smoked ham or
bacon prior to its inclusion with the beams and sauce. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
319.310

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
